localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Visualize your team's recurring tasks and processes in Slack. Build visual workflows using drag and drop interface and run the workflows to get a bird's eye view into your recurring processes. Sign up with Slack and run your first workflow in <1 min!
blogPost.body: Visualize your team's recurring tasks and processes in Slack. Build visual workflows using drag and drop interface and run the workflows to get a bird's eye view into your recurring processes. Sign up with Slack and run your first workflow in <1 min!
blogPost.title: Finisher - Build visual streamlined workflows for your team in Slack
blogPost.author: George Hannes

localize.description: 在Slack中可视化您团队的重复性任务和流程。使用拖放界面构建可视化工作流，并运行该工作流，以获得重复性流程的鸟瞰图。注册Slack并在<1分钟内运行您的第一个工作流!
localize.tagline: 在Slack中为你的团队打造可视化的精简工作流程。

localize.description: 在Slack中可視化您團隊的重複性任務和流程。使用拖放界面構建可視化工作流，並運行該工作流，以獲得重複性流程的鳥瞰圖。註冊Slack並在<1分鐘內運行您的第一個工作流!
localize.tagline: 在Slack中爲你的團隊打造可視化的精簡工作流程。

previous.excerpt: OneUp allows you to schedule Google My Business posts for the future, as well as post to multiple Google My Business locations at the same time.
previous.title: Google My Business post scheduler - Schedule GMB posts and even set them to automatically repeat

localize.description: OneUp 允许您为未来安排 Google My Business 帖子，以及同时发布到多个 Google My Business 位置。
localize.tagline: 安排GMB职位，甚至设置它们自动重复。

localize.description: OneUp 允許您爲未來安排 Google My Business 帖子，以及同時發佈到多個 Google My Business 位置。
localize.tagline: 安排GMB職位，甚至設置它們自動重複。

next.excerpt: This is an iOS Clubhouse Bio Builder. You get 70 supported fonts, a large text box editor, it's stupid easy to understand, and most importantly it's FREE!
next.title: Clubhouse Bio Builder - Craft your bio and immediately get more followers

localize.description: 这是一款iOS会所生物生成器。你会得到70种支持的字体，一个大型文本框编辑器，它愚蠢的容易理解，最重要的是它是免费的!
localize.tagline: 制作你的简历，并立即获得更多的追随者。

localize.description: 這是一款iOS會所生物生成器。你會得到70種支持的字體，一個大型文本框編輯器，它愚蠢的容易理解，最重要的是它是免費的!
localize.tagline: 製作你的簡歷，並立即獲得更多的追隨者。
